title: Abstraction & Nesting Drill
goal: Demonstrate ability to express multi-level thoughts.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Tanru review:

blanu gerku = ?
barda bo sutra gerku = ?

(Answers: blue dog, (big-fast) dog)

Review Material (5-7 min)

Abstraction Types

Cmavo Type Use
nu Event Things that happen
du'u Proposition Facts/statements
ka Property Qualities
ni Amount Degree/quantity

Basic Abstraction

lo nu mi klama

The event of me going.

lo du'u do gleki

The fact that you're happy.

Nested Abstractions

mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama

I know that you want to go. (3 levels)

tu'a Shortcut

mi djica tu'a lo plise

I want something-involving apples.

be/bei Inside Abstractions

lo djica be lo nu klama

The wanter of going.

Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Simple Abstractions

Create:

  1. The event of eating.
  2. The fact that it's good.
  3. The property of being blue.
Answers
  1. lo nu citka
  2. lo du'u ri xamgu
  3. lo ka blanu

Exercise 2: Nested (2-3 Levels)

Translate:

  1. I know that you're happy.
  2. Alice thinks that Bob wants to go.
  3. I believe that you know that it's true.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do gleki
  2. la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u la .bob. cu djica lo nu klama
  3. mi krici lo du'u do djuno lo du'u ri jetnu

Exercise 3: With tu'a

Simplify using tu'a:

  1. mi djica lo nu citka lo plise →
  2. mi se cinri lo nu tadni la .jbobau. →
Answers
  1. mi djica tu'a lo plise
  2. mi se cinri tu'a la .jbobau.

items.text: Alice thinks that Bob wants to go.
items.answer: `la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u la .bob. cu djica lo nu klama`

items.text: I believe that you know that it's true.
items.answer: `mi krici lo du'u do djuno lo du'u ri jetnu`

items.text: `mi djica lo nu citka lo plise` →
`mi se cinri lo nu tadni la .jbobau.` →

sections.content:
Challenge (1-2 min)

Build the most complex sentence you can:

Include:

  • Nested abstractions (2+ levels)
  • tu'a or be/bei
  • Conversion (se/te)

Example:

mi djuno lo du'u lo prenu poi ke'a se ctuca mi cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu tadni cu vajni

(I know that the person who is taught by me thinks that studying is important.)

Summary

You reviewed abstractions and nested structures for expressing complex thoughts.

Tomorrow preview: Connectives and modals marathon.
